column1: #Text=1 . A composition comprising a ) at least one antimycotic agent and b ) at least one water soluble film forming agent , wherein component b ) is a derivative of chitosan selected from hydroxyalkylchitosans and carboxyalkylchitosans .
#Text=2 . The composition according to claim 1 , wherein component a ) is present in an amount of 0.1 to 15 wt. % .

#Text=3 . The composition according to claim 1 or 2 , wherein component a ) is selected from 1 -hydroxy-2-pyridone compounds , imidazole derivatives , polyene derivatives , allylamine derivatives , triazole derivatives , morpholine derivatives , griseofulvin compounds , acidic compounds , tolnaphtate , flucytosine and salts thereof .
#Text=4 . The composition according to any of the preceding claims , wherein component a ) is ciclopirox or a salt thereof .
#Text=5 . The composition according to any of the preceding claims , wherein component b ) is present in an amount of 0.1 to 10 wt. % .
#Text=6 . The composition according to any of the preceding claims , wherein component b ) is hydroxypropylchitosan .
#Text=7 . The composition according to any of the preceding claims , further comprising c ) at least one physiologically acceptable solvent .

#Text=8 . Use of the composition according to any of the preceding claims as a nail varnish . Use of a water soluble film forming agent selected from hydroxyalkylchitosans and carboxyalkylchitosans as an additive in a nail varnish .
